TEXT.English: RICHESE[NEWLINE]Fourth planet in the Epsilon Eridani star system, and classed with Ix as supreme in machine culture since both planets escaped the more severe effects of the Butlerian Jihad. Richese was noted for miniaturization.

TEXT.English: %s1_year. The savage winds of Arrakis sweep across the sea of sand. They rip and tear at deserted settlements, abandoned cities, the burnt-out husks of grounded thopters and carryalls, the wind-etched skeletons of the fallen.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The titanic struggle to control the planet and its priceless treasure, the spice melange, now seems like a distant memory. The Great Catastrophe has wiped out all but a remnant of each of the warring factions. Communication links with the Spacing Guild and your Homeworld are lost, and your ragged band must now struggle to rebuild and revive all that is lost.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The %s2_civ now look to you to lead them and gain control over Dune. Remember, %s3_leader, he who controls Arrakis controls the spice, and he who controls the spice controls the universe. Do you have the strength and cunning to prevail? Rise from beneath the sandstorm, overcome your rivals and become the Master of Dune!
TEXT.French: %s1_year. Les Vents sauvages d'Arrakis balayent la mer de sable. Ils s'engouffrent et déchirent les campements désertés, les villes abandonnées, les carcasses calcinées de transporteurs et thopters cloués au sol à jamais, les squelettes érodés de ceux qui sont tombés. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] la lutte titanesque pour le contrôle de la planète et de son trésor inestimable, l'Epice, apparaît n'être qu'un lointain souvenir. La Grande Catastrhope a détruit le peu qui restaient des factions en guerre. Les relais de communication avec la Guilde spaciale et votre monde natal sont perdus, et les survivants doivent lutter chaque jour pour survivre et tenter de reconstruire tout ce qui a été perdu. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Les %s2:3_civ comptent sur vous pour les guider et reprendre le contrôle de Dune. Souvenez-vous, %s3_leader, celui qui contrôle Arrakis contrôle l'Epice, et celui qui contrôle l'Epice contrôle l'Univers. Avez-vous assez de force, de courage et de ruse pour l'emporter ?

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Kwisatz Haderach: "Shortening of the Way." This is the label applied by the Bene Gesserit to the unknown for which they sought a genetic solution: a male Bene Gesserit whose organic mental powers would bridge space and time. [ICON_BULLET]Settled as free specialist in the Capital, his Prescience will grant extra beakers and espionage points according to his ability and spice usage. [ICON_BULLET]Each following Kwisatz Haderach will substitute the previous one. [ICON_BULLET]The existence of the Precursor allows a chance for every unit, after a combat victory, to gain 'Inspired I'.

[ICON_BULLET]Kwisatz Haderach: "Shortening of the Way." This is the label applied by the Bene Gesserit to the unknown for which they sought a genetic solution: a male Bene Gesserit whose organic mental powers would bridge space and time. [ICON_BULLET]Settled as free specialist in the Capital, his Prescience will grant extra beakers and espionage points according to his ability and spice usage. [ICON_BULLET]Each following Kwisatz Haderach will substitute the previous one. [ICON_BULLET]The existence of the Aspirant allows a chance for every unit, after a combat victory, to gain 'Inspired II'.

[ICON_BULLET]Kwisatz Haderach: "Shortening of the Way." This is the label applied by the Bene Gesserit to the unknown for which they sought a genetic solution: a male Bene Gesserit whose organic mental powers would bridge space and time. [ICON_BULLET]Settled as free specialist in the Capital, his Prescience will grant extra beakers and espionage points according to his ability and spice usage. [ICON_BULLET]Each following Kwisatz Haderach will substitute the previous one. [ICON_BULLET]The existence of the Candidate allows a chance for every unit, after a combat victory, to gain 'Inspired III'.

[ICON_BULLET]Kwisatz Haderach: "Shortening of the Way." This is the label applied by the Bene Gesserit to the unknown for which they sought a genetic solution: a male Bene Gesserit whose organic mental powers would bridge space and time. [ICON_BULLET]Settled as free specialist in the Capital, his Prescience will grant extra beakers and espionage points according to his ability and spice usage. [ICON_BULLET]Each following Kwisatz Haderach will substitute the previous one. [ICON_BULLET]The existence of the Kwisatz Haderach allows a chance for every unit, after a combat victory, to gain 'Inspired IV'. [ICON_BULLET]Will inspire every Bene Gesserit city.
The Bene Gesserit Breeding Project comes in four levels. Ultimately it will produce a Kwisatz Haderach. When each level is complete, one irreplaceable specialist is granted.
TEXT.French: Le projet de procréation Bene Gesserit contient Quatre niveaux. Au stade ultime, cela engendrera le Kwisatz Haderach. Lorsque chaque niveau est terminé, une Unité unique et irremplaçable est disponible. Chaque unité a un champ de vision supérieur et booste la puissance des unités qui combattent à ses cotés.
TEXT.German: The Bene Gesserit Breeding Project comes in four levels. Ultimately it will produce a Kwisatz Haderach. When each level is complete, one irreplaceable unit is granted. Each unit has a longer visibility range and gives a stronger combat boost to units in its stack.
TEXT.Italian: The Bene Gesserit Breeding Project comes in four levels. Ultimately it will produce a Kwisatz Haderach. When each level is complete, one irreplaceable unit is granted. Each unit has a longer visibility range and gives a stronger combat boost to units in its stack.
TEXT.Spanish: The Bene Gesserit Breeding Project comes in four levels. Ultimately it will produce a Kwisatz Haderach. When each level is complete, one irreplaceable unit is granted. Each unit has a longer visibility range and gives a stronger combat boost to units in its stack.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET] Tleilaxu Masters are the real minds of the Bene Tleilax. Masters served the community while exercising considerable latitude of choice. They would assemble in meetings, at holy places known as "Kehls" where they would consider important decisions while "feeling the presence of their God". Masters exercised control of decisions with respect to Genetics. Many were avid researchers who "spoke parts of the language of God", their term for the arrangements of DNA.
TEXT.French: Masters are the leaders and real minds of the Bene Tleilax.
TEXT.German: Masters are the leaders and real minds of the Bene Tleilax.
TEXT.Italian: Masters are the leaders and real minds of the Bene Tleilax.
TEXT.Spanish: Masters are the leaders and real minds of the Bene Tleilax.

TEXT.English: Like Great Prophets, a Tleilaxu Master can construct Religious Shrines. In addition, they can also construct the 'Great Kehl' and use the special abilities 'Purge the Powindah' and 'Stimulate the Language of God' (See Dune Concepts). Finally, they can settle in a city as a specialist providing an unique combination of yield and commerce values.
TEXT.French: Like Great Prophets, a Tleilaxu Master can construct Religious Shrines. In addition, they can also construct the 'Great Kehl' and use the special abilities 'Purge the Powindah' and 'Stimulate the Language of God' (See Dune Concepts). They can also settle in a city as a specialist providing an unique combination of yield and commerce values.

In addition, they can also construct the 'Great Kehl' and use the special abilities 'Purge the Powindah' and 'Stimulate the Language of God' (See Dune Concepts). They can also settle in a city as a specialist providing an unique combination of yield and commerce values.

In addition, they can also construct the 'Great Kehl' and use the special abilities 'Purge the Powindah' and 'Stimulate the Language of God' (See Dune Concepts). TEXT.English: The Axlotl Tank (a combination of the term "Axlotl", a small animal capable of regenerating limbs) was a device used by the Bene Tleilax to create and nurture their products, especially gholas and other complete organisms. "Tank" is a misnomer term. The actual artifact consists of a sessile human female who has been modified to dormantly accept chemical and biological cues necessary to grow the needed biological artifacts. These may be "grown" in another Axlotl tank or may be formed from a sexually mature human female. Normally the personality of the adult female is either suppressed or destroyed during the process of "formation" or "installation".

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET] The mainstay of Tleilaxu technology was the "Axlotl Tank". This device was eventually discovered to be a human female whose womb was modified by changes in her genetics to produce various products. The "Axlotl Tank" did not possess any sapience but was simply a melding of machine and flesh which did the bidding of the Masters, somewhat akin to livestock. The use of the Axlotl Tank dehumanizes females while at the same time explains the absence of "Tleilaxu females". The Bene Tleilax were themselves products of of their own technology, each fulfilling a separate role within the Tleilaxu community. The Axlotl Tank and its secrets were closely held by the Tleilaxu.[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET] Axlotl Great Person Tanks will appear in a city by themselves as experiments of an Axlotl Chamber (required) and their total number will be directly related to the number of Assassinated Specialists by Face Dancers and the number of Added Free Specialists to the specific city.

TEXT.Spanish: La unidad se "atrinchera" para aguantar mejor los ataques del enemigo. Obtiene una bonificación defensiva del 5%% por cada turno que se fortifique hasta un máximo de un 25%%.

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Creates the Miles Teg Unit[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Miles Teg was a highly regarded Bene Gesserit military commander who held the rank of Supreme Bashar. He was a descendant of Duke Leto Atreides, and a Mentat. Teg's training through the Bene Gesserit involved much of the learning instilled in Reverend Mothers. This was largely attributed to Teg's mother, who was a Bene Gesserit Reverend Mother herself. Therefore Teg was both a Mentat and a Bene Gesserit adept, a combination that made him a formidable military commander for the Sisterhood. [NEWLINE] Teg end up being tortured by the Honored Matres using a T-Probe; under the severe stress and agony produced by the probe's attempts to gain control of his body and knowledge, his Mentat abilities and Atreides genes elevated him to a higher level of being. He became able to move faster than the eye can see by accelerating his metabolism, and he gained mild prescience, which he describes as a doubled vision which gives him intimations of danger. His accelerated speed comes at the cost of incredible energy expenditure; he has to consume huge amounts of carbohydrates to regain his energy.
Your Miles Teg has gained +1 CombatStr and +1 ExtraMoves!
